input.sentences: last week i ordered some parts for my computer .
the box arrived all banged up with the instructions on top .
the fan that came with the box was cracked .
i had to repack everything and send it back .
output.sentences: Today, we'll be putting together a computer.
First, we unpack the parts from the shipment.
We have to be extra careful when handling the fan.
This is what the final assembly should look like.
